newsitem.title: GERMANY: Ymos parent, group post first half loss.
newsitem.headline: Ymos parent, group post first half loss.

text.p: German auto parts maker Ymos AG said on Wednesday group and parent results improved in the first half of this year, but the company still made a loss.
Ymos said in a statement ahead of its shareholder meeting on Wednesday that at both the parent and group levels, the company lost about five million marks in the first six months of 1997.
The parent result was 20 million marks better than the first half of 1996 and the group result posted an improvement of 15 million marks, Ymos said.
Series production sales, meanwhile, climbed 22 million marks to 310 million marks.
Ymos said it planed to publish more detailed results for the first half of the year at the end of August.
